$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.title: $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.caption: Favorites
$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPa.text:
\define checked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab" tags=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtoolbar" tags=""/> 
\end
\define unchecked-frozen()
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/sidebar-tab" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/viewtoolbar" tags="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"/> 
\end

These settings let you customise the behaviour of Favorites plugin.

---

;Show Favorites setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox checkactions=<<checked-frozen>> 
   tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/frozen-list" tag="$:/tags/SideBar"
	 checkactions=<<checked-frozen>>
	 uncheckactions=<<unchecked-frozen>> > Enable frozen tab</$checkbox>
:<input type="checkbox" disabled> Viewtoolbar icon color <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css" 
	field="button-color" tag="input" type="color"/>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/styles/image.css" 
	 field="button-color" checked="#ff0000" unchecked="#bbb"> Reset viewtoolbar icon color</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/a.text: \import $:/plugins/kookma/favorites/macros/definition \whitespace trim \define add-this-tiddler() [[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[putfirst[]] \define remove-this-tiddler() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define show-favorites-button(class) \whitespace trim <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/image}} <$list filter='[match[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}/> \end \define add-to-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="notselected"/> \end \define remove-from-favorites-button() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Remove}} class=<> > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler={{{[subfiltercontainslimit[1]]}}} $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$macrocall $name="show-favorites-button" class="selected"/> \end <$list filter="[listis[current]]"> <> <$list filter="[all[current]!list]"> <>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.text:
.wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-all-links}};
  position: relative;
  top: -0.6em;
  left: -0.8em;
  opacity: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!initial-opacity}};
  margin-right: -1em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab svg{
  width: 0.97em;
  height: 0.97em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  transition:opacity {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!transition}}s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(1,-0.06,.39,.89);
}

.tc-tab-selected + .wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-single-link}};
}

.tc-vertical > .wltc-link-to-tab {
  top: -1.9em;
  left: 0;
  height: 0;
  float: right;
}

.tc-search-results .wltc-link-to-tab a {
  display: contents;
  padding: 0;
}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.title: $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.caption: Shiraz
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Shiraz plugin.

---

;Show Shiraz setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/multicols/storyriver" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Multicolumn story river</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/misc/ui-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorful UI buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/misc/tiddler-button-visibility" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Tiddler visibility on mouse hover</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/misc/edit-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Traffic lights for edit toolbar buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/colorful-sidebar-tab" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorify sidebar tabs</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> Show switch palette on page controls</$checkbox>

<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette]contains:tags[$:/tags/PageControls]]">

;Set dark and light palette
{{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-light-palette}}
</$list>

$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.title: $:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/quickConnectButton
$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.caption: {{$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/icon}} {{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}}
$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap/misc/q.text:
\define buttonClass() $(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $(additional-classes)$ \define nonExistentItem() <> (will be created) \end \define noConnectionsMsg() //No connections found!// \end \define normalSearchFilter() [!is[system]!has[draft.of]search:title{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}sortcs[title]limit[50]] \end \define regexSearchFilter() [!is[system]!has[draft.of]regexp{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}sortcs[title]limit[50]] \end \define showButton(state) \whitespace trim <$button set="$:/temp/tmap/state/popup/quickConnect" setTo="$state$" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}} class=<>> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]">{{tiddlymap.svg}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/TiddlyMap/Caption}}/> \end \define searchResults() <$button tooltip="Create incoming edge"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-create-edge" from=<> to=<> force="true" label={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type}} view={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/view}} /> <$button tooltip="Create outgoing edge"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-create-edge" from=<> to=<> force="true" label={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type}} view={{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/view}} /> <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" emptyMessage=<>> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" /> \end \define hidePopup() <$macrocall $name="showButton" state=<> /> \end \define showPopup() <$set name="additional-classes" value="tmap-active-button"> <$macrocall $name="showButton" state="" /> <$set name="searchFilter" filter="[field:title[$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar]has[re-filter]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>>
Create connection
Type: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type" field="text" type="text" tag="input" default="" /> <$select tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch/type" default=""> <$list filter=<>>
Search: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/quickConnectSearch" type="text" tag="input" default=""> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="re-filter" checked="1" unchecked="" default=""> regexp
<$list filter=<> variable="item"> <> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/quickConnectSearch}regexp[.+]] -[is[tiddler]]" variable="item"> <>
Existing Connections
<$select tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="direction" default="both"> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar" field="filter.links" checked="-[[tw-body:link]]" unchecked="" default=""> hide links
<$tmap-connections filter=<> direction={{$:/state/tmap/tid-toolbar!!direction}} emptyMessage=<>>
>><> <$link to=<>><$view field="title" /> <> <$button tooltip="Delete this connection" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$action-sendmessage $message="tmap:tm-remove-edge" id=<> from=<> to=<> type=<> />
\end <$list filter="[all[current]is[tiddler]]"><$list filter="[{$:/temp/tmap/state/popup/quickConnect}prefix]" variable="item" emptyMessage=<>><>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.caption: Trashbin
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confirm-empty \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-operation \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/preview-option \define show-link() \whitespace trim <$link to=<> ><$text text={{{ [removeprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}} /> <$reveal state="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" type="match" text="show">  <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0MM/0DD/YYYY 0hh:0mm AM"/> \end \define date-button() <$list filter="[title[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]!is[tiddler]]"> <$button set="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" setTo="show" tooltip="Show date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/xp/images/time}} <$list filter="[title[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]is[tiddler]]"> <$button tooltip="Hide date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date"/> {{$:/xp/images/remove}} \end \define recycle-button() {{||$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button}} \end \define delete-button() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Delete permanently"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/times.svg}} <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title>]" variable=ignore> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define trashbin-siderbar-ui() <$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]limit[1]]' variable=null emptyMessage="Trashbin is empty">
<> <> <> <> <>    <$count filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]]'/> items <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]$(sortType)$]">
<>
<>
<>
\end <$vars sortType={{{[get[text]] ~[[]] }}}> <>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-vers.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-version
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-vers.text:
/* TW-version added to site title */
.tc-site-title:before {
  content:"TW <>";
  position:absolute;
  margin-top:-1.9em;
  color:silver;
  font-size:13px;
}

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/Vie.text: \whitespace trim \define stateTid() $:/state/utility/view-fields \define show-fields-button() \whitespace trim <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show" default="hide"> <$button set=<> setTo="show" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class=<> > <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show" default="hide"> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ tc-selected"""> <> \end \define disp-on-pagecontrols() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/utility/images/view-fields.svg}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}}/> \end <>

$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.title: $:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPanel/Settings
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.caption: Utility
$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPane.text:
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Utility plugin. --- ;Show Utility setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ;Options :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/ViewFields" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> Enable show fields :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/styles/tw-version" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Show the Tiddlywiki version badge :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplate/display-tiddler-raw-content" tag="$:/tags/ViewTemplate"> Display the tiddler raw content
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/utility/viewtemplate/display-tiddler-raw-content]tags[]search[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]" variable=ignore> Filters to reveal tiddlers content   <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/utility/config/reveal-tags" field="text" tag=input defualt="" placeholder="enter a filter e.g. [tag[myTag]] " class="kk-ut-txt"/>
